power.title: Arcane Anchor
power.fluff: You trigger latent enchantments placed on yourself or an ally to resist being pushed around the battlefield

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You or at least one ally you can see within 10 squares of you is pushed, pulled, or slid

section.name: Target:
section.target: you and each triggering ally in the burst
section.target2: one triggering ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You negate the triggering forced movement.

power.title: Arcane Springboard
power.fluff: Infusing a small square of prepared cloth with arcane energy, you create a bouncy surface that launches allies who step on it

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure an arcane springboard in a square in range. The springboard does not occupy its square and lasts until the end of your next turn.

When you or an ally enters the springboard's space, that character can immediately jump a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier. This movement does not count towards the maximum distance the character can move during that action. A character can only benefit from this once per turn.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The springboard persists until the end of your next turn. If you or an ally is currently occupying the springboard's space, you can choose to make that character jump as if he or she had entered the springboard's space.

power.title: Bolster Armor
power.fluff: You touch an armor, causing it to briefly glow as you enhance its defences

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains a +1 bonus to AC until the end of the encounter, and can use the following action:

section.name: Free Interrupt:
section.text: Trigger: The target is hit by an attack; The target gains a +4 bonus to AC against the triggering attack. After the attack has been resolved, this effect ends.

power.title: Reinforced Minion
power.fluff: You send energy to bolster one of your artifices, helping it to evade an attack that might have otherwise damaged it

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Your summoned creatures within 5 squares of you is hit by an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack misses the target.

power.title: Reinforcing Compound
power.fluff: You infuse a comrade with a reinforcing mixture that they can share forward

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains temporary hit points equal to 10 + one-half your level. While it has these temporary hit points, the target can use the following action:

section.name: Minor Action:
section.text: The target transfers any number of the temporary hit points on him or her to an ally within 5 squares.

power.title: Shadowy Figurine
power.fluff: Your magic creates an ebon figurine cloaked in shadow, with tendrils of shadow stretching from it to envelop you and your allies in obscurity

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure a shadowy figurine in a square in range. The figurine does not occupy its space and remains until the end of your next turn.
While within within 2 squares of the figurine, you and your allies gain concealment and a +4 power bonus to Stealth checks.
If the figurine is in a square of dim light or darkness, you and your allies instead gain total concealment.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The figurine persists until the end of your next turn, and you can move it up to 5 squares.

power.title: Swift Mender
power.fluff: You empower a tiny construct to zoom to an ally's aid

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can make a saving throw against one effect, even if that effect does not normally end on a save.
If the effect effect is ongoing damage, the target can roll twice and use either result.
